secures the pop cluster & puff is a part of the stitches it is not written separately in the pattern additional information  all stitches go into the next stitch of previous round unless the pattern says otherwise  square brackets indicate the main repeat you will need to repeat the instructions between the amount of times specified  * * indicate the repeat you will need to repeat the instructions between * * the amount of times specified  parentheses indicate o a group of sts to be worked into the same st/space o a group of sts worked together o additional information  2dc = 2 double_crochet into one st the same applies to any number of any stitches  dc2 = 1 double_crochet into each following 2 sts the same applies to any number of any stitches  ch4 counts as exdc  ch3
